#summary Configure World → F-Commands

=Configure World → F-Commands=

The *F-Commands* section of the World Configuration contains eleven inputs, labelled F2 to F12. You can enter commands to be sent (including /commands) to the MU`*` when any of these buttons are pressed. (F1 shows this Help window.)

[http://potatomushclient.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/ConfigureWorldsFCommands.gif]
